text: Charlie 'Higgo' Higson-Smith is a Hong Kong rugby union player. He plays for the Hong Kong Football Club and the Hong Kong national rugby union team. Higson-Smith made his international debut for Hong Kong at the 2015 Asian Rugby Championship against South Korea. Charlie is known by his close friends simply as El Higgo or Gonzalo. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Hong Kong rugby union players Category:Hong Kong international rugby union players Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Charlie Higson-Smith
